original_text:
Then he remembered the days of old,
    of Moses and his people.
Where is he who brought them up out of the sea
    with the shepherds of his flock?
Where is he who put in the midst of them
    his Holy Spirit,
korean_text: 백성이 옛적 모세의 때를 기억하여 이르되 백성과 양 떼의 목자를 바다에서 올라오게 하신 이가 이제 어디 계시냐 그들 가운데에 성령을 두신 이가 이제 어디 계시냐

sentences.original_text: Then he remembered the days of old,
Where is he who brought them up out of the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 바다에서 인도하여 올리신 분이 어디 계시며,

sentences.original_text: with the shepherds of his flock?
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 양 떼의 목자들과 함께 계신가?

sentences.original_text: Where is he who put in the midst of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 가운데 두신 분이 어디 계시며,
